name: St. Emilie de Rodat

locations.description: Founder of the Sisters of the Holy Family of Villefranche

summary: Emilie de Rodat was a French religious sister and founder of the Sisters of the Holy Family of Villefranche. She dedicated her life to educating poor children, especially in rural areas of France. She established schools and worked tirelessly for the education and care of the poor. She was canonized in 1950.
